longBusinessSummary: Kajima Corporation engages in civil engineering, building construction, real estate development, architectural design, and other businesses worldwide. It engages in the construction of power stations, railways, roads, airports, and seaports; design and consulting; procurement and construction; sales and services; book publishing; hotel and leisure; and greening and insurance businesses. The company is also involved in the processing and sales of construction materials; leasing, buying, and selling of buildings and other ancillary facilities; manufacture and construction of construction machinery; design and construction activities; building management and maintenance works; operation and management of tolls; planning, production, sale, and construction of interiors; golf course management; hotel management; and real estate and development rental businesses. The company was founded in 1840 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
